minecraft:written_book_content.title: As Above
minecraft:written_book_content.author: Minecraft
pages:
{"text":"This mysterious structure has something off about it.

This portal has been unlit for a long time.

Wherever this portal went has long since been forgotten, if it even worked in the first place.

How could have it"}

{"text":"ever been lit to begin with, in this hellish place?

Maybe this world wasn’t always like this.

You can’t help but wonder…

Where did this portal lead?"}
